entries: You managed to escape the devastation that the Whispering Tyrant brought to your nation, but you lost everything to the lich-king's minions, including your home and many friends and family.
Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Constitution or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost.
You're trained in the {@skill Medicine} skill and the {@skill Lore||Undead Lore} skill. You gain the {@feat Battle Medicine} skill feat.
